chapter.title: Migrating to Red Hat CloudForms 3.2
chapter.para: You can migrate to Red Hat CloudForms 3.2 (CFME 5.4) from the following versions:
If you are using an earlier version of Red Hat CloudForms or ManageIQ EVM, you must first migrate to Red Hat CloudForms 3.0, then migrate to Red Hat CloudForms 3.2.

formalpara.title: Migrating from Red Hat CloudForms 3.1 or Red Hat CloudForms 3.0 (hardened)
formalpara.para: See the Red Hat Knowledgebase article at for instructions on migrating from Red Hat CloudForms 3.1.1 (CFME 5.3.1) and above or Red Hat CloudForms 3.0 (CFME 5.2) hardened to Red Hat CloudForms 3.2 (CFME 5.4).

formalpara.title: Migrating from Red Hat CloudForms 3.0 (unhardened)
formalpara.para: See the Red Hat Knowledgebase article at for instructions on migrating from Red Hat CloudForms 3.0 (CFME 5.2.x) unhardened to Red Hat CloudForms 3.2 (CFME 5.4).
